, case when then 1 else 0 end as admin_flag
, opp.enable_role_inherit, opp.enable_role_allocate, case when opp.enable_role_permission = 1 then 1 when opp.enable_role_permission = 0 and ( ir.code in (#{siteSuperRole}, #{tenantSuperRole}) or exists ( select 1 from hiam_label_rel hlr join iam_label il on (hlr.label_id = il.id) where hlr.data_id = ir.id and hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' and hlr.assign_type = 'A' and il.name = #{tenantAdminLabel} ) ) then 1 else 0 end as enable_role_permission
from iam_member_role imr join iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id join iam_role_tl irt ON (ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{lang}) join hpfm_tenant ht on ht.tenant_id = ir.h_tenant_id left join hpfm_tenant_tl httl ON ht.tenant_id = httl.tenant_id AND httl.lang = #{lang} left join hiam_user_config huc on ( imr.member_id = huc.user_id and imr.h_assign_level_value = huc.tenant_id and imr.role_id = huc.default_role_id )

select ir.id, ir.code as code, ir.fd_level, irt.name as name, ir.h_tenant_id, httl.tenant_name, ir.h_parent_role_assign_level, ir.h_parent_role_assign_level_val, case when huc.default_role_id is not null then 1 else 0 end as is_default_role, opp.enable_role_inherit, opp.enable_role_allocate, case when opp.enable_role_permission = 1 then 1 when opp.enable_role_permission = 0 and ( ir.code in (#{siteSuperRole}, #{tenantSuperRole}) or exists ( select 1 from hiam_label_rel hlr join iam_label il on (hlr.label_id = il.id) where hlr.data_id = ir.id and hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' and hlr.assign_type = 'A' and il.name = #{tenantAdminLabel} ) ) then 1 else 0 end as enable_role_permission
, case when ir.code in (#{siteSuperRole}, #{tenantSuperRole}) or exists ( select 1 from iam_menu ps join iam_role_permission irp on (irp.permission_id = ps.id and irp.type = 'PS') where irp.role_id = ir.id and (irp.h_create_flag = 'Y' or irp.h_inherit_flag = 'Y') and ps.type = 'ps' and ps.h_enabled_flag = 1 and ps.code like #{adminRolePs} ) then 1 else 0 end as admin_flag
from iam_role ir join iam_role_tl irt ON (ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{lang}) join iam_user iu on iu.id = #{memberId} join hpfm_tenant ht on ht.tenant_id = ir.h_tenant_id join hpfm_tenant_tl httl ON ht.tenant_id = httl.tenant_id AND httl.lang = #{lang} left join hiam_user_config huc on ( iu.id = huc.user_id and ht.tenant_id = huc.tenant_id and ir.id = huc.default_role_id ) left join oauth_password_policy opp on (opp.organization_id = ir.h_tenant_id) where ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} and ir.is_enabled = 1 and iu.is_enabled = 1 and iu.is_locked = 0 and iu.is_admin = 1 and ( ir.code in (#{siteSuperRole}, #{tenantSuperRole}) or ( exists ( select 1 from hiam_label_rel hlr join iam_label il on hlr.label_id = il.id where il.name = #{tenantAdminLabel} and hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} and hlr.data_id = ir.id ) and not exists ( select 1 from hiam_label_rel hlr join iam_label il on hlr.label_id = il.id where il.name like #{tplRoleLabel} and hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} and hlr.data_id = ir.id ) ) ) order by ir.h_tenant_id,ir.id asc

from iam_role ir join iam_role_tl irt ON (ir.id = irt.id AND irt.lang = #{lang}) join hpfm_tenant ht ON ht.tenant_id = ir.h_tenant_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl httl ON ht.tenant_id = httl.tenant_id AND httl.lang = #{lang} left join iam_role iri on iri.id = ir.h_inherit_role_id left join iam_role_tl irit on (irit.id = iri.id and irit.lang = #{lang}) left join iam_role irp on irp.id = ir.h_parent_role_id left join iam_role_tl irpt on (irpt.id = irp.id and irpt.lang = #{lang}) where ir.id = #{roleId}

select ir.id, ir.name as "name", ir.code as "code", ir.fd_level, ir.h_tenant_id, ir.h_inherit_role_id, ir.h_parent_role_id, ir.tpl_role_name, il.id label_id, il.name label_name, il.type label_type from iam_role ir join hiam_label_rel hlr on ( hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' and hlr.data_id = ir.id ) join iam_label il on il.id = hlr.label_id where ir.is_enabled = 1 and il.preset_flag = 1 and il.enabled_flag = 1 and exists ( select 1 from iam_label il join hiam_label_rel hlr on ( hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' and hlr.label_id = il.id ) where hlr.data_id = ir.id and il.enabled_flag = 1 and il.preset_flag = 1 and il.name = #{roleLabel} )
select irt.lang as "lang", irt.tpl_role_name as "name" from iam_role ir join iam_role_tl irt on ir.id = irt.id where ir.id = #{roleId}

select ir.id, ir.code as code, ir.fd_level, ir.h_tenant_id, ir.h_inherit_role_id, ir.h_parent_role_id, ir.h_level_path, ir.created_by_tenant_id, case when then 1 else 0 end as admin_flag, opp.enable_role_allocate from iam_member_role imr join iam_role ir on (imr.role_id = ir.id) join oauth_password_policy opp on ir.h_tenant_id = opp.organization_id where imr.member_id = #{memberId} and imr.member_type = #{memberType} and (imr.start_date_active IS NULL OR imr.start_date_active <= #{now}) and (imr.end_date_active IS NULL OR imr.end_date_active >= #{now}) and ir.is_enabled = 1
mapper.update:
update iam_role set is_enabled = #{enableFlag}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy}, last_update_date = #{now}, object_version_number = object_version_number + 1 where id = #{roleId}
or id in ( select tmp.* from ( select ir.id from iam_role ir where exists (select 1 from iam_role irp where irp.id = #{roleId} and ir.h_level_path like concat(irp.h_level_path, '|%')) ) tmp )
